title: If you are gonna change Ezreal...
body: Please keep his "You belong in a museum" taunt {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

replies.body: We kept it.
I was disappointed by the loss of "Time to feed" :c
That is a line I do miss. The Heels line was by far my least favorite thing about old Evelynn aside from her Ult being %Current health damage (Whiiiiiiiiiiich I still wish her E was, ironically.)
You're not wrong, BUT her new VO has some of the best lines in the game imo, so I'm ok with it

> [{quoted}](name=FauxSchizzle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMuEqlVI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-07T21:03:31.791+0000)
>
> We kept it.

What about the map quote?  He needs his map quote.

Don't change him too much.  I don't think I could take it if he was suddenly super different from the map-less explorer I know and love =(

His E is the only spell that'll change, though his other spells might get tinkered with to support the new spell within his kit. 

Otherwise, they just want to improve his art, visuals, and voice over, along with the little things that go into a VGU, like animations, sound effects, and new splash arts.

EDIT- I've been informed that Essence Flux is his W, and I can't remember why I got that wrong.
It's the W that's gonna be changed, not the E.
Lol, I'm dumb. Thanks for pointing it out though.
You should expect very similar gameplay

> [{quoted}](name=EROTIC RAID BOSS,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMuEqlVI,comment-id=000000010002,timestamp=2018-08-07T23:31:59.996+0000)
>
> You should expect very similar gameplay

There's more to a champ than gameplay.  I'm afraid of losing the core essence of who he is as a character in appearance, voice, and animations more than his gameplay (although losing his gameplay would crush me too).

Old aatrox main here. 

Hey there.

> [{quoted}](name=SextingWithSiren,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMuEqlVI,comment-id=00000001000200000001,timestamp=2018-08-08T05:11:51.415+0000)
>
> Old aatrox main here. 
> 
> Hey there.

I'm sorry for your loss =(

1 Aatrox Game in Season 7..
Sick main
If you would go read his patch history you would know why we stopped playing him back when his passive guts and then mini reworked into even worse trash.

Interesting. I really like ezreal, but more like... I like his look as he is in his splash art, and his gameplay, they both represent a really fun fantasy too. however, his VO, his animations and model?  those are straight garbage, at least compared to more modern releases. his VO doesn't at all express who he is as a character, there's no sense of personality or story beyond just a bit of cockiness. and his animations are just sad. 


the potential for his animations are through the roof though. get whoever did the animations on irelia or aatrox on ezreal and you will get something really great. I'd especially like to get a sense of momentum from his shifts, of a bit of wild fun to how he aims his gauntlet etc. 


Also he can't be changing too much, they're keeping his current splash art and just adjusting it to match the new changes.

> [{quoted}](name=EROTIC RAID BOSS,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMuEqlVI,comment-id=00000001000200000000,timestamp=2018-08-08T01:33:21.566+0000)
>
> Interesting. I really like ezreal, but more like... I like his look as he is in his splash art, and his gameplay, they both represent a really fun fantasy too. however, his VO, his animations and model?  those are straight garbage, at least compared to more modern releases. his VO doesn't at all express who he is as a character, there's no sense of personality or story beyond just a bit of cockiness. and his animations are just sad. 
> 
> 
> the potential for his animations are through the roof though. get whoever did the animations on irelia or aatrox on ezreal and you will get something really great. I'd especially like to get a sense of momentum from his shifts, of a bit of wild fun to how he aims his gauntlet etc. 
> 
> 
> Also he can't be changing too much, they're keeping his current splash art and just adjusting it to match the new changes.

I'm fine with updating him.  I just don't want the core bits to be changed.  For example, his blue mystic bow that he shoots his abilities with.  His wild blonde hair.  His rugged adventurer look.  The cocky kid "I'm the best" mentality.  Yeah his model needs updating and his animations could be smoother, but I hope through that they keep the character about the same so I won't be like "who's that?" when I see him in game.
It sounded more like an update than a change? At least that's what I got out of it, or maybe that's just what I'm hoping for lol. like still the same kid but he's got more interactions and stuff.

Very much what we are going for. A deepening, not a rework or change.  I hope to post more about this in the near future. In the meantime, can we all just gush about how good Interlocutioner's  Nunu and Willump VO is? Please?

I like this, I'd like to see more "deepenings". Some Champions I already like their lore, personality, etc, but they are so outdated and have like five lines. 

And yes, I'm loving everything about Nunu and Willump. I can't wait until they are live.

I very much dislike Nunu's VO. The lines are ***way*** too long. Any regular movement or attack spell that's supposed to be funny shouldn't be a setup and a punchline. It should be short. It should be like Cait's "sorry boys, I keep the fuzzy cuffs at home." It's funny, but doesn't come off as trying so fucking hard that it's cringe-worthy
I wouldn't dare lose such an iconic line.
That's what a rioter told us about "It takes a lot of effort to move like this in heels." {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

Can't speak to that. Can speak to Ezreal. 

We kept the line. 

It's my favorite Ez line. It sparked the writing of MANY more Ez lines. 

Ez has a lot of lines. 

I loved writing Ez. 

"Who needs a map?" is in the game. 

You will see.

> [{quoted}](name=FauxSchizzle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMuEqlVI,comment-id=00000001000300000000,timestamp=2018-08-16T15:33:13.720+0000)
>
> Can't speak to that. Can speak to Ezreal. 
> 
> We kept the line. 
> 
> It's my favorite Ez line. It sparked the writing of MANY more Ez lines. 
> 
> Ez has a lot of lines. 
> 
> I loved writing Ez. 
> 
> "Who needs a map?" is in the game. 
> 
> You will see.

Love the bravado this post radiates
What about his ultimate skin?

> [{quoted}](name=Jikker,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMuEqlVI,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-08-07T22:06:08.824+0000)
>
> What about the map quote?  He needs his map quote.
> 
> Don't change him too much.  I don't think I could take it if he was suddenly super different from the map-less explorer I know and love =(

Ezreal being map-less is core to his character for me.
and his voice actor? i kinda like him.
I'm not in love with him. Honestly I don't know his acting range, just know he like voiced gohan or something. But I would like a VO that brings a real personality to the character

> [{quoted}](name=EROTIC RAID BOSS,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMuEqlVI,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-08-07T23:33:01.914+0000)
>
> I'm not in love with him. Honestly I don't know his acting range, just know he like voiced gohan or something. But I would like a VO that brings a real personality to the character

You don't know his acting range? I'm going to tell you something important now, so you better dig the wax out of those ears of yours and listen! The reputation of this voice actor echoes far and wide. When they talk about a great talent - the man of incredible range and masculinity - they're talking about him! The mighty Kyle Herbert! Just who the hell do you think he is!
well that's a much better anime than dbz

> [{quoted}](name=EROTIC RAID BOSS,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMuEqlVI,comment-id=00000000000000020000,timestamp=2018-08-18T19:32:47.969+0000)
>
> well that's a much better anime than dbz

That's how ~~Team Dai-Gurren~~ Riot rolls!
For his range, he also plays Jarvan IV and Graves, lol.

I mean i couldn't care less about gohan's english voice character and (the character is quite boring anyway tbh). But i like ezreals voice. 

I think he feels confident and slightly cocky which is perfect for his character imo. He's a pretty much prodigy and i'd assume in lore he'd fight in a simillar way jumping out of his enemy's grasp at the last second, making some offhand remark.

Using the same voice actor would also allow for his lines to be expanded. if they have the time to record for a whole voice over that can be added to his current lines, then that would be a huge amount of lines.

But for real this time or like you promised to keep Evelynn's line "It takes a lot of effort to move like this in heels"?
[This is where Rioter said she will still have it](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/6kFXY1kR/d/KxseJ1Uk?comment=00050000000100010002)

> [{quoted}](name=FauxSchizzle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMuEqlVI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-07T21:03:31.791+0000)
>
> We kept it.

You said that about Evelynn and "It takes a lot of effort to walk like this in heels" 

So I don't believe till I hear it.
fo schizzle??  ;P
Yo.

I hope you also kept 
‘Noxians ..... I hate those guys’
Yarp.

> [{quoted}](name=FauxSchizzle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMuEqlVI,comment-id=000000080000,timestamp=2018-08-16T02:22:34.974+0000)
>
> Yarp.

But noxians need love 2 {{sticker:sg-janna}}
Did you guys get a new Voice actor or did Kyle come back?

> [{quoted}](name=FauxSchizzle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMuEqlVI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-07T21:03:31.791+0000)
>
> We kept it.

Also keep the hate for noxians...ugh, I hate these guys

> [{quoted}](name=FauxSchizzle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMuEqlVI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-07T21:03:31.791+0000)
>
> We kept it.

Thank god. I was getting a little worried when his VGU was announced.
{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

Are you guys using the same voice actor? 

Honestly, I know ezreal has some iconically silly voice lines but I'm not at all married to hearing them all the time, I can't wait for the new VO
Glad to see leashing for the jungle will remain as obnoxious as ever.
*Show me your moves!*
